title: Request New Software Installation
description: A faculty member needs specialized statistical software installed on their university-owned computer.

tasks.description: Identify the faculty member and the software they are requesting (e.g., 'SPSS').
Check if the university has a site license for the requested software.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that the university has a license for SPSS.

tasks.description: Create a software installation ticket for the desktop support team.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a ticket to have a technician remotely install the software.
